attributes.action: change the law to stop the police demanding DNA test without warrant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This simple change makes it ilegal for police to use the Arrest excuse and demand DNA. DNA belongs to the person and is under Human Rights that persons own. Such a law would stop abuse, make it a juditial event on provision of valid information. Not do as we please by the Police. Just as the detention laws a person must have legal access to object in a democratic society.
